TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit HashCode extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 将多个值的哈希代码合并为一个哈希代码。

span.span: Combines the hash code for multiple values into a single hash code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用以将多个值 （例如，在结构或类上的字段） 组合成单个哈希代码。You can use to combine multiple values (for example, fields on a structure or class) into a single hash code. 此结构会在两种方式之一运行：This structure operates in one of two ways: * 接受的一组最多 8 个值组合的静态方法。Static methods that accept a set of up to eight values to combine. * 两个实例中以流形式相关，一次接受值一个操作的方法。Two instance methods that operate in a streaming fashion, accepting values one at a time. > [!WARNING] > 很视为实现详细信息，哈希代码的最佳做法，因为该实现可能在程序集版本之间发生更改。It is best-practice to consider hash codes as an implementation detail, as the implementation may change across assembly versions. 不存储生成的哈希代码中序列化结构，例如，磁盘上。Do not store hash codes produced by in serialized structures, for example, on-disk. 使用静态初始化的随机种子来强制实施此最佳做法，这意味着，哈希代码的确定性操作系统过程的作用域内。 uses a statically initialized random seed to enforce this best practice, meaning that the hash codes are only deterministic within the scope of an operating system process. ### 静态方法Static Methods 静态方法组合最多 8 个值的默认哈希代码。The static methods combine the default hash codes of up to eight values. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example1.vb#1)] ### 实例方法Instance Methods > [!IMPORTANT] > 必须调用的每个实例中最多一次。 must be called at most once per instance of . 实例方法组合多个八个值的哈希代码。The instance methods combine the hash codes of more than eight values. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example2.vb#1)] 实例方法还将合并根据一组特定生成的哈希代码实现。The instance methods also combine the hash codes produced by a specific implementation. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example3.vb#1)] 结构必须传递按引用到其他方法，因为它是值类型。The structure must be passed by-reference to other methods, as it is a value type. [!code-csharp[System.HashCode.Structure#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/cs/example4.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.HashCode.Structure#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.hashcode.structure/vb/example4.vb#1)]

span.span: Adds a single value to the hash code, specifying the type that provides the hash code function.

summary.span: 传播由指定值返回的哈希代码。

span.span: Diffuses the hash code returned by the specified value.

returns.span: 表示单个值的哈希代码。

span.span: The hash code that represents the single value.

remarks.span: 某些数据结构假定哈希代码扩散大范围内。

span.span: Some data structures assume that hash codes are diffused across a large range.

remarks.span: 此方法来提高返回的值的哈希代码的质量，，简单的例如，一个整数值的基础数据类型时非常有用。

span.span: This method improves the quality of the hash code returned by the value and is useful when the underlying data type is simple, for example, an integer value.

summary.span: 连续调用 后计算最终哈希代码。

span.span: Calculates the final hash code after consecutive invocations.
The calculated hash code.

remarks.span: 每个实例，必须最多一次调用此方法。

span.span: This method must be called at most once per instance of .
